tasks.title: Integrate Board and Column Components with Backend and Auth
tasks.description: Connect the main Board and Column components to the backend using the existing task-service and AuthProvider. Reference the prototype for dynamic, production-ready behavior. Use the design system for all UI and Tailwind v4.1 for styling.

subtasks.title: Establish Backend API Connection
subtasks.description: Set up and configure the frontend to communicate with the backend API for Board and Column data, ensuring endpoints for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting are available.
subtasks.details: Implement API client logic, handle HTTP requests/responses, and ensure error handling is in place for all Board and Column operations.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication Handling
subtasks.description: Integrate authentication mechanisms to secure API requests, ensuring only authorized users can access and modify Board and Column data.
subtasks.details: Use JWT or similar tokens, inject authentication headers into API calls, and manage user sessions and permissions in the frontend.

subtasks.title: Enable Dynamic Data Loading
subtasks.description: Develop logic to dynamically load Board and Column data based on user actions and API responses, supporting real-time updates and state management.
subtasks.details: Implement state management (e.g., context/provider pattern), handle loading states, and ensure UI reflects the latest backend data.

subtasks.title: UI Implementation with Design System
subtasks.description: Build Board and Column components using the established design system, ensuring consistency with reusable UI elements and design tokens.
subtasks.details: Leverage the design system for layout, typography, and component structure, and ensure accessibility and responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Apply Tailwind v4.1 Styling
subtasks.description: Style the Board and Column components using Tailwind CSS v4.1, adhering to the design systemâ€™s guidelines and ensuring modern, maintainable styles.
subtasks.details: Utilize Tailwind utility classes, customize with design tokens, and ensure styles are consistent across all states and breakpoints.

subtasks.title: Validate Prototype Behavior
subtasks.description: Test and validate the integrated Board and Column components against prototype requirements, ensuring correct behavior, interactions, and data flow.
subtasks.details: Perform user scenario walkthroughs, check for edge cases, and confirm that all features (e.g., adding, editing, filtering columns) function as intended.

tasks.title: Integrate TaskCard Component with Backend and Design System
tasks.description: Connect the TaskCard component to display dynamic task data from the backend, using the design system and referencing the prototype. Ensure all styling uses Tailwind v4.1.

tasks.title: Integrate Task Creation with Backend and Auth
tasks.description: Connect AddTaskForm to the backend using task-service and AuthProvider, ensuring new tasks are dynamically added to the Todo column. Use the design system and Tailwind v4.1 for UI.

tasks.title: Integrate Drag and Drop with Backend and Dynamic State
tasks.description: Enable drag and drop for tasks using the existing backend logic and prototype, ensuring dynamic updates and production readiness. Use the design system and Tailwind v4.1 for styling.

tasks.title: Integrate Modal and Task Editing with Backend and Design System
tasks.description: Connect Modal and EditTaskForm components to the backend for editing tasks, using the design system and referencing the prototype. Style with Tailwind v4.1.

tasks.title: Integrate Task Deletion with Backend and Confirmation Modal
tasks.description: Connect DeleteTaskForm and confirmation modal to the backend for deleting tasks, using the design system and referencing the prototype. Style with Tailwind v4.1.

tasks.title: Integrate Daily View with Backend and Dynamic Filtering
tasks.description: Enable viewing tasks by date using dynamic filtering from the backend, referencing the prototype and using the design system. Style with Tailwind v4.1.

tasks.title: Integrate Column Reordering with Backend and Dynamic State
tasks.description: Enable column reordering using the backend and prototype logic, ensuring dynamic updates and persistence. Use the design system and Tailwind v4.1 for styling.

tasks.title: Polish UI/UX and Finalize Responsive Design Using Design System
tasks.description: Refine the UI/UX, ensure full responsiveness, and implement remaining improvements using the design system and referencing the prototype. Style with Tailwind v4.1.
